特定类别的药物可以逆转饮食引起的肥胖、脂肪肝和糖尿病卡罗林斯卡学院的研究人员可能已经找到了一种通过针对细胞动力源线粒体来治疗肥胖和相关疾病的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Specific-class-of-drugs-can-reverse-diet-induced-obesity-fatty-liver-and-diabetes-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Specific-class-of-drugs-can-reverse-diet-induced-obesity-fatty-liver-and-diabetes-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e829c8db-ab4d-41bb-a867-088314260969 Tue, 30 Apr 2024 10:59:45 -0400 Specific class of drugs can reverse diet-induced obesity, fatty liver and diabetes in mice
怀孕期间戒烟可防止胎盘与胎儿体重不匹配卑尔根大学和埃克塞特大学的一项新研究表明，戒烟的孕妇可以防止胎盘重量与胎儿生长之间的异常不匹配。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Quitting-smoking-during-pregnancy-prevents-placental-fetal-weight-mismatch.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Quitting-smoking-during-pregnancy-prevents-placental-fetal-weight-mismatch.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50678853-1562-40b6-a165-03095a595807 Tue, 30 Apr 2024 10:29:23 -0400 Quitting smoking during pregnancy prevents placental-fetal weight mismatch
UNIGE 的合成抗凝剂提供肝素的可靠替代品抗凝治疗对于治疗心脏病、中风和静脉血栓等许多疾病至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/UNIGEs-synthetic-anticoagulant-provides-reliable-alternative-to-heparin.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/UNIGEs-synthetic-anticoagulant-provides-reliable-alternative-to-heparin.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a975813-6aa2-48c1-b737-121f04f8632a Tue, 30 Apr 2024 08:07:15 -0400 UNIGE's synthetic anticoagulant provides reliable alternative to heparin
有毒气体加剧了孟菲斯西南部长期的污染多年来，罗丝·西姆斯（Rose Sims）都不知道佛罗里达街上一栋不起眼的砖砌建筑内发生了什么，该建筑距离她位于城镇西南侧的简陋单层住宅仅几英里。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Toxic-gas-adds-to-a-long-history-of-pollution-in-Southwest-Memphis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Toxic-gas-adds-to-a-long-history-of-pollution-in-Southwest-Memphis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4fabe710-84d6-4e33-856a-19cd806f0b40 Tue, 30 Apr 2024 07:00:35 -0400 Toxic gas adds to a long history of pollution in Southwest Memphis

研究调查了新生儿维生素 D 对成年期湿疹的潜在影响澳大利亚研究人员发现，新生儿维生素 D 水平较高与早发持续性湿疹的几率较低相关，但 25 岁以下儿童早发湿疹消退的风险增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Study-investigates-the-potential-effects-of-neonatal-vitamin-D-on-eczema-up-to-adulthood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Study-investigates-the-pottial-effects-of-neonatal-vitamin-D-on-eczema-up-to-adulthood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1e3badd-8eb2-4ecd-ae92-aaa323c48ef6 Tue, 30 Apr 2024 00:42:00 -0400 Study investigates the potential effects of neonatal vitamin D on eczema up to adulthood
研究表明儿童食物多样性较差与较高的健康成本有关研究强调了食物多样性低对儿童健康和经济成本的负面影响，强调需要改善饮食多样性以减少医疗费用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Study-links-poor-food-diversity-in-children-to-higher-health-costs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Study-links-poor-food-diversity-in-children-to-higher-health-costs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71831817-dd63-49b7-b50f-925a421e552f Tue, 30 Apr 2024 00:16:00 -0400 Study links poor food diversity in children to higher health costs
